mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.customer_id AS customerId, s.id AS stationId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, l.customer_category AS customerCategory, l.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, l.business_address AS businessAddress, l.gender, l.customer_situation AS customerSituation, l.business_years AS businessYears, l.current_financing AS currentFinancing, l.credit_demand AS creditDemand, l.demand_month AS demandMonth, l.demand_period AS demandPeriod, l.business_progress AS businessProgress, l.customer_source AS customerSource, l.is_applied AS isApplied, l.apply_time AS applyTime, l.is_approved AS isApproved, l.approve_time AS approveTime, l.loan_product_name AS loanProductName, l.loan_amount AS loanAmount, l.credit_limit AS creditLimit, l.loan_balance AS loanBalance, l.overdue_status AS overdueStatus, l.creator AS creatorId, l.create_time AS createTime, l.updater AS updaterId, -- 从 grid_customer 的 location 字段提取经纬度（POINT 类型） -- 注意：POINT存储格式为 POINT(latitude, longitude) ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_huinong_customer_loan l LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON l.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN grid_huinong_station s ON c.grid_id = s.grid_id AND s.deleted = 0 WHERE l.id = #{id} AND l.deleted = 0

SELECT l.id, l.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, l.customer_category AS customerCategory, l.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, l.business_years AS businessYears, l.current_financing AS currentFinancing, l.create_time AS createTime FROM grid_huinong_customer_loan l LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON l.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE l.deleted = 0
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqVO.customerName}, '%')
AND c.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqVO.phone}, '%')
ORDER BY l.create_time DESC

SELECT l.id, l.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, l.customer_category AS customerCategory, l.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, l.business_address AS businessAddress, l.loan_amount AS loanAmount, l.overdue_status AS overdueStatus, -- 从 grid_customer 的 location 字段提取经纬度（POINT 类型） -- 注意：POINT存储格式为 POINT(latitude, longitude) ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_huinong_customer_loan l INNER JOIN grid_customer c ON l.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN grid_huinong_station s ON c.grid_id = s.grid_id AND s.deleted = 0 WHERE s.id = #{stationId} AND l.deleted = 0 AND c.location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.create_time DESC

SELECT c.grid_id AS gridId, s.station_name AS stationName, ST_X(s.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(s.location) AS longitude,
COUNT(*) AS value
SUM(CASE WHEN l.is_applied = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS value
SUM(CASE WHEN l.is_approved = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS value
SUM(IFNULL(l.loan_balance, 0)) AS value
COUNT(*) AS value
FROM grid_huinong_customer_loan l INNER JOIN grid_customer c ON l.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN grid_huinong_station s ON c.grid_id = s.grid_id AND s.deleted = 0 WHERE l.deleted = 0 AND s.location IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.grid_id, s.station_name, s.location ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT c.id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude, s.grid_marketing_flag AS stationType, l.is_applied AS isApplied, l.is_approved AS isApproved, l.loan_balance AS loanBalance, l.customer_category AS customerCategory FROM grid_huinong_customer_loan l INNER JOIN grid_customer c ON l.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN grid_huinong_station s ON c.grid_id = s.grid_id AND s.deleted = 0 WHERE l.deleted = 0 AND c.location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.create_time DESC
